definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pull down, break down (NH Hoph., and deriv.; cf. perh. Eth. na3ata: (with transp. and weakening of sibilant), destruere, demoliri, excidere Di:634);—

lit. pull down a structure (acc.): altar Ju Jdg 2:2, Jdg 6:30, Jdg 6:31, Jdg 6:32, Ex 34:13 (J), De 7:5, 2Ki 23:12; high place ([[במה]]) v:2Ki 23:8, [[בָּמָה]] + [[מִזְבֵּחַ]] v:2Ki 23:15; [[מַצֵּבָה]] 2Ki 10:27; [[בֵּית הַבַּעַל]] v:2Ki 10:27, 2Ki 11:18 = 2Ch 23:17, cf. 2Ki 23:7; a tower Ju Jdg 8:9, Jdg 8:17, cf. Ez Eze 26:9 ([[בְּחַרְבוֹתָיו]]); (any) house Is 22:10, Ez Eze 26:12, Le 14:45, so [[הַנְּחֻחִים]] Je 33:4 (strangely + [[אֶל]], cf. Gf Gie); city-wall Je 39:8, 2Ki 25:10 = Je 52:14; city Ju Jdg 9:45.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: pull down a nation, break its power, [[וּלְהַאֲבִיד]] ´[[וְלִנְתוֹשׁ וְלִנ]] ([[פָוְלַהֲרוֹס]]) (obj. not expressed) Je 1:10 (so Sir 49:7 b), = Sir 18:7, cf. Sir 31:18.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: an individual, subj. God, [[יִתְּחֵנִי סָבִיב]] Job 19:10, [[יִתָּחְְ]] Ps 52:7.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: jaw-teeth of lions (metaph.) Ps 58:7 (break down, break off, so only here, but v. [[נׇתַע]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be pulled, broken, down: Pf. 3 pl. ´[[נִתְּחוּ מִפְּנֵי י]] Je 4:26 (of cities), so [[מִמֶּנּוּ]] ´[[נ]] Na 1:6 (of rocks).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִתַּץ]] 2Ch 33:3; 3 pl. [[וְנִתְּחוּ]] Ez Eze 16:39 (consec.); 2 mpl. [[וְנִתַּחְתֶּם]] De 12:3; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיְנַתֵּץ]] 2Ch 34:7; 3 mpl. [[וַיְנַתְּחוּ]] 2Ch 31:1 + 2 t.;—tear down (chiefly late): c. acc. altars De 12:3, + [[בָּמוֹת]] 2Ch 31:1, + [[הַחַמָּנִים]], etc., 2Ch 34:4, + [[אֲשֵׁרִים]] v:2Ch 34:7; [[בָּמוֹת]] alone 2Ch 33:3, [[רָמׂתַיִח]] Ez Eze 16:39; city wall 2Ch 36:19.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: be torn down: Pf. 3 ms. [[נֻתַּץ]] Ju Jdg 6:28 (of altar + [[אֲשֵׁרָה]]).

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: pass. Ges:§ 53 u) be broken down, broken, only Impf. 3 ms. [[ייֻתָָּץ]] Le 11:35 (of [[תַּנּוּר]], v. Dr-White:Hpt, and [[כִּירַיִם]], v. supr., p. 468 b).
